tool_description: Organizes and categorizes journal entries into structured archives by date, topic, mood, or custom criteria.

entries.description: Array of formatted journal entries to organize

organization_method.description: Method for organizing: chronological, topic, mood, custom

error_messages: No entries provided: Supply at least one journal entry for organization.
Invalid organization method: Use one of [chronological, topic, mood, custom].
Invalid date range: Ensure date_range_start is before date_range_end when using chronological organization.
Too many entries: Maximum 1000 entries can be processed in a single organization operation.
Invalid sort order: Use either ascending or descending.
Missing grouping criteria: Provide grouping_criteria when using custom organization method.
usage: Provide entries array and select organization_method. For chronological organization, set date ranges. For custom organization, specify grouping_criteria. Returns structured archive with organized entries.

organized_groups.description: Names of the organized groups or categories

archive_structure.description: Description of the archive organization structure

total_entries.description: Total number of entries in the archive

organization_date.description: When the archive organization was performed

archive_statistics.description: Statistical summary of the archive contents
